responses: You can check with the CapAir lost and found if the item was lost within a CapAir airplane or facility. If the item was lost anywhere else, please contact airport security. If the bag is not found, you are entitled to reimbursement for the bag and any items within the bag up to $3,800 USD. More information is available here: [Policies](https://cap-air.com/about/policies)
